Package client

Class ChatClient

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
client.ChatClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ChatClient extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
This class overrides some of the methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.
Version:
July 2000
Author:
Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, Dr Robert Laganiè, François Bélanger

      Throws:

  • Method Details

    • handleMessageFromServer

      public void handleMessageFromServer(Object msg)
      Handles incoming data from the server by decrypting the message and processing it based on the request type. Each request type updates specific local fields or sets error/state variables as needed.

      Possible request types and their effects:

      • "msg": Expects a String message from the server; stored in lastResponseMsg.
      • "subscribers": Expects a List<Subscriber> containing subscriber records; stored in subscriberList.
      • "getsubscriber": Expects a single Subscriber record; stored in subscriber.
      • "connected": Expects a String session ID; stored in sessionId.
      • "login": Expects a String that, when split on `;`, contains a serialized User plus an associated name. The User is parsed and stored in user, the name in name.
      • "book": Expects a serialized Book record; deserialized and stored in book.
      • "books": Expects a List<Book> containing multiple Book records; stored in books.
      • "bookinfo": Expects an Object[] with book availability info; stored in bookAvailibilityInfo.
      • "isbookreserved": Expects a String representation of an integer; parsed and stored in intResponse to indicate if a book is reserved.
      • "history": Expects a serialized String representing a list of DetailedHistory records; deserialized and stored in historyList.
      • "borrowedbooks": Expects a List<BorrowedBook> containing borrowed-book records; stored in borrowedBooks.
      • "notifications": Expects a List<Notification> containing user notifications; stored in notifications.
      • "data": Expects any general Object; stored in data for later processing.
      • "error": Expects a String describing an error; stored in lastResponseError.
      Specified by:
      handleMessageFromServer in class ocsf.client.AbstractClient
      Parameters:
      msg - the raw message object (typically of type Message) received from the server
